entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , West Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 9:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: NNE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except southeast 50 near the water after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
